```{r}
install.packages("rpart")
library(rpart)
install.packages("rpart.plot")
library(rpart.plot)
```



```{r}
dataset <- read.csv2('./datasets/survey_results_public.csv', header = TRUE, sep = ',')
#head(dataset)
columns <- c("ConvertedCompYearly", "Country", "YearsCode", "YearsCodePro", "OrgSize", "DevType", "EdLevel", "Age", "WorkExp", "RemoteWork")
columns_for_future <- c("LearnCode", "LanguageHaveWorkedWith", "PlatformHaveWorkedWith", "ToolstackHaveWorkedWith")
dt <- head(dataset[, columns], 100)
dt
```

# Criando a Arvore de decisao
```{r}
modelo_salario <- rpart(ConvertedCompYearly~YearsCode+YearsCodePro+Country, 
                                  data=dt,
                                  method="class",
                                  control=rpart.control(minsplit = 15,
                                                        xval = 3),
                                  parms=list(split="Information"))
```

```{r}
modelo_salario
```


```{r}
arvore_decisao <- rpart.plot(modelo_salario, type = 2)
arvore_decisao
```
